titles.title: We Know Thee Who Thou Art
Prayer After Pardon

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: We know Thee who Thou art, Lord Jesus, Mary's Son; We know the yearnings of Thy heart To end Thy work begun.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: That sacred fount of grace, 'Mid all the bliss of Heav'n, Has joy whene'er we seek Thy face, And kneel to be forgiv'n.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Brought home from ways perverse, At peace Thine arms within, We pray Thee, shield us from the curse Of falling back to sin.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: We dare not ask to live Henceforth from trials free; But oh! when next they tempt us, give More strength to cling to Thee.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: We know Thee who Thou art, Our own redeeming Lord; Be Thou by will, and mind, and heart, Accepted, loved, adored.
